Second Chance.name: Second Chance
Second Chance.sourceRef: Player's Handbook, Heroes of the Fallen Lands
Second Chance.fullText:
Halfling Racial PowerSecond Chance

Luck and small size combine to work in your favor as you dodge your enemy’s attack.

Encounter  
Immediate Interrupt      Personal

Trigger: You are hit by an attack.

Effect: The attacker must reroll the attack and use the second roll, even if it is lower.


Published in Player's Handbook, page(s) 44, Heroes of the Fallen Lands, page(s) 266.
Second Chance.flavor: Luck and small size combine to work in your favor as you dodge your enemy’s attack.
keywords:
Personal

Trigger: You are hit by an attack.

Effect: The attacker must reroll the attack and use the second roll, even if it is lower.

Personal

Effect: The attacker must reroll the attack and use the second roll, even if it is lower.

Happy Feet.name: Happy Feet
Happy Feet.fullText:
Halfling Racial Utility 2Happy Feet

It’s hard to keep your feet under control. Sometimes they feel as if they move of their own accord.

Encounter
Immediate Reaction      Personal

Trigger: A creature you can see starts its turn.

Effect: You shift up to 2 squares.


Published in Dragon Magazine 402.
Happy Feet.flavor: It’s hard to keep your feet under control. Sometimes they feel as if they move of their own accord.

Minor Threat.name: Minor Threat
Minor Threat.fullText:
Halfling Racial Utility 6Minor Threat

Clearly you’re no threat to your enemies, injured as you are. You convince them of that by affecting a small and harmless posture.

Encounter      Stance
Minor Action      Personal

Requirement: You must be bloodied.

Effect: You assume the minor threat stance. Until the stance ends and while you are bloodied, you have a +2 power bonus to all defenses and to Stealth checks.


Published in Dragon Magazine 402.
Minor Threat.flavor: Clearly you’re no threat to your enemies, injured as you are. You convince them of that by affecting a small and harmless posture.

Pay Your Debts.name: Pay Your Debts
Pay Your Debts.fullText:
Halfling Racial Utility 10Pay Your Debts

You acknowledge an ally’s assistance by making a feint to keep your enemy off balance.

At-Will
Immediate Reaction      Special

Trigger: An enemy flanked by you moves out of the flanked position.

Effect: Choose one ally who was also flanking the triggering enemy. That ally gains combat advantage against the enemy until the end of your next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 402.
Pay Your Debts.flavor: You acknowledge an ally’s assistance by making a feint to keep your enemy off balance.

Underfoot Hustle.name: Underfoot Hustle
Underfoot Hustle.fullText:
Halfling Racial Utility 16Underfoot Hustle

You roll between your enemy’s legs and spring up on the other side.

Encounter
Move Action      Personal

Effect: You shift up to your speed +2. You can move through squares occupied by enemies, but you must end your movement in an unoccupied square. Enemies whose spaces you move through in this way grant combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 402.
